column3: na medze moho esi abantsentsen no do
column4: na matsɛw ahwɛ dza EWURADZE nye me bɛka

column5: na ma ɔnyɛ pefee wɔ abopon do
column6: ama nyia ɔdze mbirika mpo oeenya no akenkan yie."

column2: "Na enyido adzehu no bɛba wɔ ber a wɔahyɛ no mu na ɔregye kwan aba mu
column3: na orinndzi ator da: sɛ ɔkyɛr mpo a

column4: ɔnntsen wɔ no mu: na ɔtseneneenyi dze
column5: ɔnam no nokwardzi do benya nkwa."

column3: na wɔyɛ nyimpa ahokyerɛfo a wonnyi abodwee; hɔn na wɔtserɛw hɔn akɔndɔ mu dɛ asamanadze
column5: wɔmmee da. Wɔfa amanaman ndɔmmum ba hɔn nkyɛn

column3: ber reba a hɔn ndɔmmumfo no besi hɔn atwetwe na woedzi hɔn nkasaetwuw
column5: Nyia ɔdze nsisi fom dza ɔnnyɛ nedze no
column6: ondue! W’epoobɔ yi bɔkɔ do ara ekodu dabɛn?"

column2: "Aso hɔn a wɔdzedze wo akaw no nkɔsoɛr awerɛfir mu
column3: na hɔn a aka hɔn ahyɛ no nkenyan ma ɔwo abɛdan hɔn asadze?"

column2: "Ɔnam dɛ afa amanaman pii afo ntsi
column3: ɔwoso aman mu nkaa no nyina bɛfa wo afo; na osian nyimpa bɔgyaa aka egu
column4: na ewurkadze a ayɛ wɔ asaase
column5: na kurow no na no mu atsefo nyina do ntsi."

column2: "Onyia no a onya mfaso bɔn ma ne fi
column3: dɛ ɔdze ne berɛbuw risi sorsor
column4: ama woeeyi no efi mbusu nsa no

column2: "Ɔwo enye enyito etu egyina ama wo fie
column3: dɛ etwitwa aman pii egu na ayɛ wo kra bɔn."

column2: "Na ɔbo befi woara wo fasu no ho bɛtsea mu
column3: na mpuna efi ndua no mu agye do."
na ɔdze emumuyɛ tsintsim kuropɔn no
ana ommfir dɔm EWURADZE na aman yɛ edwuma berɛ ma ogya
column4: na amanaman fona hɔnho ma egyangyandze?"

column3: EWURADZE n’enyimnyam ho nyimdzee bɛhyɛ asaase ma
column4: dɛ mbrɛ esu kata po do."

column3: wɔ adwe bɔn kwan do no

column2: "Enyito ahyɛ wo ma sen enyimnyam: ɔwo so nom
column3: na yɛ dɛ monomonomnyi: hwɛ EWURADZE n’abanyimfa kɔɔpow no bɛdan aba wo do
column4: na enyimguase tantan bɛkata w’enyimnyam do."
na mbowa hɔn sɛɛe a ɔmaa wɔbɔɔ piriw; na adasa hɔn bɔgyaa a ekae gui
column5: ewurkadze a edze ayɛ asaase no
column6: na no mu atsefo no nyina no bobua w’etsifi."

column3: mfaso bɛn na onya? Wɔyɛ ehonyi a woegu na ator akyerɛkyerɛfo
column4: osiandɛ sɛ odwimfo yɛ abosom mmum a
column5: ɔdze no werɛ twer noara n’edwindze a ɔayɛ."

column3: Nyan; na ɔse ɔbo mmum dɛ
column6: ondue! Aso iyi botum akyerɛkyerɛ? Hwɛ
column7: wɔdze sika na dwetɛ egu ho
column8: naaso ahom biara nnyi no mu koraa."

column2: "Na EWURADZE dze ɔwɔ n’asɔrfi krɔnkrɔn no mu: wɔmma asaase nyina ntaa dzinn wɔ n’enyim."
